13.bwt: Yə̌ ɛ́yə́ sí lɔ́líní ɛ bî  tɛ́ngɛnɛ KORÓNAVAYRUSƏ tɔ̂ COVID-19

14.bwt: Yə̌ ɛ́yə́ sí lɔ́líní ɛ bî  tɛ́ngɛnɛ KORÓNAVAYRUSƏ tɔ̂ COVID-19

15.bwt: Yə̌ ɛ́yə́ sí lɔ́líní ɛ bî  tɛ́ngɛnɛ KORÓNAVAYRUSƏ tɔ̂ COVID-19

44.bwt: Korónavarusə tɔ̂ COVID-19, ɛ́ dí kɛ́n ɛ kɔ́nə́. Ɛtî ɛ́ wusuwə ɛ́yə́ ndúm ɛ nyítíní tɛ́ngɛnɛ nyambɛ̂ anín ɛ́ bílí á ɛkumbu ɛ́ Chǐna, á madû 31 má December, 2019. Nyambɛ̂ anín a wɔ́ŋí biyəmblan ngə bí ŋgɔ́nkɛlɛ, a tingání pə́ mɔ ɛ bulu njí a dí mɔ á nyǔ bwám bwam. A mə́ ɛ kután baʼ á bikumbu jǐta á nkí n shiyə̌. Mɔ ká fɔ́ a bíyǎ á fə́ nyambɛ̂ anin a fíní.
44.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

45.bwt: Korónavarusə tɔ̂ COVID-19, ɛ́ dí kɛ́n ɛ kɔ́nə́. Ɛtî ɛ́ wusuwə ɛ́yə́ ndúm ɛ nyítíní tɛ́ngɛnɛ nyambɛ̂ anín ɛ́ bílí á ɛkumbu ɛ́ Chǐna, á madû 31 má December, 2019. Nyambɛ̂ anín a wɔ́ŋí biyəmblan ngə bí ŋgɔ́nkɛlɛ, a tingání pə́ mɔ ɛ bulu njí a dí mɔ á nyǔ bwám bwam. A mə́ ɛ kután baʼ á bikumbu jǐta á nkí n shiyə̌. Mɔ ká fɔ́ a bíyǎ á fə́ nyambɛ̂ anin a fíní.
45.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

46.bwt: Korónavarusə tɔ̂ COVID-19, ɛ́ dí kɛ́n ɛ kɔ́nə́. Ɛtî ɛ́ wusuwə ɛ́yə́ ndúm ɛ nyítíní tɛ́ngɛnɛ nyambɛ̂ anín ɛ́ bílí á ɛkumbu ɛ́ Chǐna, á madû 31 má December, 2019. Nyambɛ̂ anín a wɔ́ŋí biyəmblan ngə bí ŋgɔ́nkɛlɛ, a tingání pə́ mɔ ɛ bulu njí a dí mɔ á nyǔ bwám bwam. A mə́ ɛ kután baʼ á bikumbu jǐta á nkí n shiyə̌. Mɔ ká fɔ́ a bíyǎ á fə́ nyambɛ̂ anin a fíní.
46.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

55.bwt: Mɔ awə̌ a wɔ́ŋí nyambɛ̂ a nlə́m
55.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

56.bwt: Mɔ awə̌ a wɔ́ŋí nyambɛ̂ a nlə́m
56.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

57.bwt: Kɛ́n ɛ kɔ́nə́ ɛ nínán ɛ tingání ɛ kutan baʼ bá kɔ́l ɛsə́sə̌n. Batína na baʼ ábə́ bá mə̌ ɛ́ wɔ́ŋ biyəmblan bí nyambɛ̂ (ngə nyambɛ̂ a pəmi, nyambɛ̂ a bɔmbɔ́, nyambɛ̂ a nlə́m, nyambɛ̂ a makǐ ámə́ má pulu) bá míndí ngə baʼ ábə́ njí kɛ́n ɛ nínan ɛ kwilí bɔ́ á nyǔ bá kfún nkfulu n nə̂n.
57.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

58.bwt: Kɛ́n ɛ kɔ́nə́ ɛ nínán ɛ tingání ɛ kutan baʼ bá kɔ́l ɛsə́sə̌n. Batína na baʼ ábə́ bá mə̌ ɛ́ wɔ́ŋ biyəmblan bí nyambɛ̂ (ngə nyambɛ̂ a pəmi, nyambɛ̂ a bɔmbɔ́, nyambɛ̂ a nlə́m, nyambɛ̂ a makǐ ámə́ má pulu) bá míndí ngə baʼ ábə́ njí kɛ́n ɛ nínan ɛ kwilí bɔ́ á nyǔ bá kfún nkfulu n nə̂n.
58.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

59.bwt: Kɛ́n ɛ kɔ́nə́ ɛ nínán ɛ tingání ɛ kutan baʼ bá kɔ́l ɛsə́sə̌n. Batína na baʼ ábə́ bá mə̌ ɛ́ wɔ́ŋ biyəmblan bí nyambɛ̂ (ngə nyambɛ̂ a pəmi, nyambɛ̂ a bɔmbɔ́, nyambɛ̂ a nlə́m, nyambɛ̂ a makǐ ámə́ má pulu) bá míndí ngə baʼ ábə́ njí kɛ́n ɛ nínan ɛ kwilí bɔ́ á nyǔ bá kfún nkfulu n nə̂n.
59.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

68.bwt: -Ɛkwɛ́sí ɛ́ kínjyə na wuwa wú maka má nyǔ

69.bwt: -Ɛkwɛ́sí ɛ́ kínjyə na wuwa wú maka má nyǔ

70.bwt: Nkfulu, ɛfi , ɛkfwɛ́sí ɛ nkínjyə́, wuwa wú maka má nyǔ, wukɔ́mbɔ́kɔm, baʼ ábə́ bá kfulu bafɔ́ bá wú wuwa, dwi álə́ lí pə́ŋí, ɛbɔm, yɔndɔmbwá, wusán. Baʼ báfɔ́ ká nyambɛ̂ anin a mə̌ bɔ́  ɛ kutan, bá míndí bwǎm. Baʼ jǐta bá pwi ká bá núŋiyǎ mə̌.
70.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

71.bwt: Nkfulu, ɛfi , ɛkfwɛ́sí ɛ nkínjyə́, wuwa wú maka má nyǔ, wukɔ́mbɔ́kɔm, baʼ ábə́ bá kfulu bafɔ́ bá wú wuwa, dwi álə́ lí pə́ŋí, ɛbɔm, yɔndɔmbwá, wusán. Baʼ báfɔ́ ká nyambɛ̂ anin a mə̌ bɔ́  ɛ kutan, bá míndí bwǎm. Baʼ jǐta bá pwi ká bá núŋiyǎ mə̌.
71.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

72.bwt: Nkfulu, ɛfi , ɛkfwɛ́sí ɛ nkínjyə́, wuwa wú maka má nyǔ, wukɔ́mbɔ́kɔm, baʼ ábə́ bá kfulu bafɔ́ bá wú wuwa, dwi álə́ lí pə́ŋí, ɛbɔm, yɔndɔmbwá, wusán. Baʼ báfɔ́ ká nyambɛ̂ anin a mə̌ bɔ́  ɛ kutan, bá míndí bwǎm. Baʼ jǐta bá pwi ká bá núŋiyǎ mə̌.
72.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

75.bwt: Mɔ a wə̌ á wɔŋí ɛkwɛ́sí

76.bwt: Mɔ a wə̌ á wɔŋí ɛkwɛ́sí

77.bwt: Njí baʼ bá núŋí pə́mi ɛyə̌ matɔ́tɔ́ mâ má díní átin, kɛ́n ɛ koróna ɛ tíngání bɔ́ ɛ kutan. Wə́ti mɔ a nyɔtí yǔm ɛ́yə́ matɔ́tɔ́ mâ má mə́ní ɛ kutan ti a kanání ɛkɛ́ á mǐ, á dwí, na á nsu, nyambɛ̂ anin a tingání mɔ́ ɛ kutan.
77.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

78.bwt: Njí baʼ bá núŋí pə́mi ɛyə̌ matɔ́tɔ́ mâ má díní átin, kɛ́n ɛ koróna ɛ tíngání bɔ́ ɛ kutan. Wə́ti mɔ a nyɔtí yǔm ɛ́yə́ matɔ́tɔ́ mâ má mə́ní ɛ kutan ti a kanání ɛkɛ́ á mǐ, á dwí, na á nsu, nyambɛ̂ anin a tingání mɔ́ ɛ kutan.
78.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

79.bwt: Njí baʼ bá núŋí pə́mi ɛyə̌ matɔ́tɔ́ mâ má díní átin, kɛ́n ɛ koróna ɛ tíngání bɔ́ ɛ kutan. Wə́ti mɔ a nyɔtí yǔm ɛ́yə́ matɔ́tɔ́ mâ má mə́ní ɛ kutan ti a kanání ɛkɛ́ á mǐ, á dwí, na á nsu, nyambɛ̂ anin a tingání mɔ́ ɛ kutan.
79.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

88.bwt: Yə̌ ɛ́yə́ sí lɔ́líní ɛ bwə nána nyambɛ̂ a nínán a si kután sə́

89.bwt: Yə̌ ɛ́yə́ sí lɔ́líní ɛ bwə nána nyambɛ̂ a nínán a si kután sə́

90.bwt: 1. Sí si nyɔtí mî, madwî na misu mí sə.

91.bwt: 1. Sí si nyɔtí mî, madwî na misu mí sə.

92.bwt: 1. Sí si nyɔtí mî, madwî na misu mí sə.

95.bwt: 2. Sí wû makɛ́ má sə ɛtî tɛ́ na sɔ́pí na madí ámə́ má sáŋí. Ti sí fyákú mɔ́ ná táwili ɛyə̌ ɛ sáŋí.
95.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

96.bwt: 2. Sí wû makɛ́ má sə ɛtî tɛ́ na sɔ́pí na madí ámə́ má sáŋí. Ti sí fyákú mɔ́ ná táwili ɛyə̌ ɛ sáŋí.
96.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

99.bwt: 3. Sí Kfwɛ́sí, sí shɛ́mu á  libɔ́ŋ lí ɛkɛ́ átin.

100.bwt: 3. Sí Kfwɛ́sí, sí shɛ́mu á  libɔ́ŋ lí ɛkɛ́ átin.

103.bwt: 4. Sí si dyá nyam ɛ pínyə́; sí si nyɔti ka pə́ nyam ɛ́yə́ ɛ dí wə́ á lungɛ́. Ndé njí sí nyɔ́tí yɔ́, sí lɔ́lí ɛ wulí makɛ́ má sə́ á fâ á shí á shí.
103.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

104.bwt: 4. Sí si dyá nyam ɛ pínyə́; sí si nyɔti ka pə́ nyam ɛ́yə́ ɛ dí wə́ á lungɛ́. Ndé njí sí nyɔ́tí yɔ́, sí lɔ́lí ɛ wulí makɛ́ má sə́ á fâ á shí á shí.
104.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

118.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

119.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

122.bwt: 7. Sí si kə̌ á fə́ limuti lí díní.

123.bwt: 7. Sí si kə̌ á fə́ limuti lí díní.

130.bwt: 9. Sí wánan á li kwisí ndúm tɛngɛnɛ yə̌ ɛ́yə́ ɛ́ bwəlan, ndé si lɔ́lí ɛ wasí á fə́ ndúm ɛni ɛ fíní.
130.en: 9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.

131.bwt: 9. Sí wánan á li kwisí ndúm tɛngɛnɛ yə̌ ɛ́yə́ ɛ́ bwəlan, ndé si lɔ́lí ɛ wasí á fə́ ndúm ɛni ɛ fíní.
131.en: 9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.

132.bwt: - Sí bəŋ nsɔŋgí n tɛlɛfónə 1510, ti sí nanní yə̌ ɛ́yə́ dɔ́kíta a pɔŋíní sə.  Misɔŋgí mí tɛlɛfónə mípə́pə̌ mɔ́ mínán:
132.en: - Call 1510 and follow the doctor's instructions. Other possible numbers:

145.bwt: Mɔ na mɔtɛ́ a lɔlí ɛ nuŋ púndá, a díshí pə́ nyǔ, a bwə misam ámə́ mí sungɛ́ mɔ́ na litúmbá lí mɔ na basún bá mɔ.
145.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.

146.bwt: Mɔ na mɔtɛ́ a lɔlí ɛ nuŋ púndá, a díshí pə́ nyǔ, a bwə misam ámə́ mí sungɛ́ mɔ́ na litúmbá lí mɔ na basún bá mɔ.
146.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.
